hi is there a way to scale?

Hi there! Yes, there is a way to scale your campaigns effectively on NewsBreak. It's important to give the system enough budget to learn and optimize. When increasing your budget, try not to double it overnight. Instead, increase it in no more than 50% increments to keep performance stable while growing your reach. For more detailed guidance, you can refer to our article on scaling strategies.

Hi there! If you're looking to scale your campaigns, I recommend checking out our Maximize Conversions Best Practices guide. It covers advanced strategies, including daily budget recommendations and targeting tactics, to help you maximize your ad performance and profitability. You can find more details in the article here: [Maximize Conversions Best Practices](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/23055076590221-Maximize-Conversions-Best-Practices). Let me know if you have any other questions!
